description:
Reborn disappears after telling Tsuna and the others to bring Yuni and meet him back in front of Irie’s device. Tsuna and his friends are flung ten years into the past to Namimori. They see that Reborn has brought the Arcobaleno and realize they were brought to the past to be tutored by the Arcobaleno. But what exactly are they going to do? Just then, with the power of Yuni’s prayers and the Arcobaleno’s pacifiers, Vongola Primo appears out of the Vongola Ring! The first generation Vongola Family begins to evaluate whether Tsuna and the gang are worthy of succeeding the Vongola Family’s true powers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I世(プリーモ)ファミリー来る!
